argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_tsrps | |- ( R e. TosetRel -> R e. PosetRel ) |
| 2 |  | #P_cnvps | |- ( R e. PosetRel -> `' R e. PosetRel ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. TosetRel -> `' R e. PosetRel ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- dom R = dom R |
| 5 | 4 | #P_istsr | |- ( R e. TosetRel <-> ( R e. PosetRel /\ ( dom R X. dom R ) C_ ( R u. `' R ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simprbi | |- ( R e. TosetRel -> ( dom R X. dom R ) C_ ( R u. `' R ) ) |
| 7 | 4 | #P_psrn | |- ( R e. PosetRel -> dom R = ran R ) |
| 8 | 1, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. TosetRel -> dom R = ran R ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_sqxpeqd | |- ( R e. TosetRel -> ( dom R X. dom R ) = ( ran R X. ran R ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_psrel | |- ( R e. PosetRel -> Rel R ) |
| 11 | 1, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. TosetRel -> Rel R ) |
| 12 |  | #P_dfrel2 | |- ( Rel R <-> `' `' R = R ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_sylib | |- ( R e. TosetRel -> `' `' R = R ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_uneq2d | |- ( R e. TosetRel -> ( `' R u. `' `' R ) = ( `' R u. R ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_uncom | |- ( `' R u. R ) = ( R u. `' R ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_syl6req | |- ( R e. TosetRel -> ( R u. `' R ) = ( `' R u. `' `' R ) ) |
| 17 | 6, 9, 16 | #P_3sstr3d | |- ( R e. TosetRel -> ( ran R X. ran R ) C_ ( `' R u. `' `' R ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_df-rn | |- ran R = dom `' R |
| 19 | 18 | #P_istsr | |- ( `' R e. TosetRel <-> ( `' R e. PosetRel /\ ( ran R X. ran R ) C_ ( `' R u. `' `' R ) ) ) |
| 20 | 3, 17, 19 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( R e. TosetRel -> `' R e. TosetRel ) |
